DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to evaluate the effect of sildenafil citrate on the pregnancy rate in women undergoing induction of ovulation using clomiphene citrate.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Sildenafil Citrate on the Success Rate of Ovulation Induction Using Clomiphene
DOC.criteria: Women age 2135 years. Anovulatory cycles due to polycystic ovaries syndrome. Nonsmokers. Free of major medical illness Women with myoma or adenomyosis Women with congenital uterine anomaly. Chronic use of any medications including nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drugs. Associated cases of infertility other than PCOs (male factor, tubal factor,â€¦.). Asherman syndrome. Cases with endometrial hyperplasia. Cases with endometrial polyp
